Name: Cave Coaster
About the game: Get ready for this epic adventure! In the game Cave Coaster, crazy miners are running rampant on rails to discover the secrets of the enchanted cave. Test your reflexes, choose new mine carts, use unique skills and win amazing jewels collecting precious gems. How far can you go? Now go explore, adventure awaits! - ACCELERATE your cart to play with more adrenaline! YAY! - UNLIMITED maps for cave running - CUSTOMIZE your mine cart - UNIQUE SKILLS to get you even further - RUN even in the dark! - UNLOCK special jewels to win even more gems!
Meta Title: Cave Coaster: Jun 4, 2015, Smyowl and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cave Coaster? Check out the release date (Jun 4, 2015), developer insights from Smyowl, and a complete game summary.
